title: Drawing, ca. 1950
medium: Brush and gold paint, black ink,  white gouache on tan paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Design uses the Hebrew Characters "Shin," painted 5 times across and 6 times down.  Characters partly obliterated by splattered black ink and white gouache.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. Brush and gold paint, black ink,  white gouache on tan paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-45.
